Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Modern Empower Dreams website

Complete rebuild of empowerdreams.org with modern design including:
- Homepage with hero, stats, mission videos, stories grid, tools section
- Blog page with featured post and card layout
- Donate page with JotForm integration
- About/Team page with values and team profiles
- Fully responsive with mobile hamburger menu
- Scroll-reveal animations and hover effects

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
